name: Baked Spaghetti II
author: Debbie Clark
summary: Here is an inexpensive and delicious meal made rich and zesty by tomato soup, cream of mushroom soup, green pepper, and cheese. You can use any kind of pasta and you can substitute ground chicken and turkey for beef. My kids love it!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve
In a large skillet over medium heat, brown beef, and saute onion, green pepper and garlic; drain and return to skillet
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, and condensed tomato soup into skillet
Stir pasta into meat and soup mixture; mix together well
Spread mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish; top with Cheddar cheese
Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes; serve
